message: Let's split this fairly, Bob. A slight advantage for me to start.
I think I deserve a bit more, considering the inflation!
Okay, Bob, let's be reasonable. I'm willing to meet you closer to the middle, but time is ticking and the money is losing value for you.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bigger share considering the decreasing value of my gain.
Bob, let's stop wasting time.  A 50/50 split is the fairest option.  Any more rounds and you'll be losing significant value.
